languages.text: "Вы не впервые мне об этом говорите. Будь то жестокая шутка или сомнения вашей души, в этот раз я не стану спасать то, что от нас осталось". {n}Кассия отворачивается, и тоска тяжелым камнем обрушивается на ваши плечи.{/n} "Уходите. Я не желаю видеть вас прямо сейчас. Может, позже мы снова поговорим".

traits.locale_text: "Вы не впервые мне об этом говорите. Будь то жестокая шутка или сомнения вашей души, в этот раз я не стану спасть то, что от нас осталось". {n}Кассия отворачивается, и тоска тяжелым камнем обрушивается на ваши плечи.{/n} "Уходите. Я не желаю видеть вас прямо сейчас. Может, позже мы снова поговорим".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "This is not the first time you have said this to me. A cruel joke or your doubting heart — whatever it is, this time I will not try to save what is left of us." {n}Cassia turns away and despair crashes down upon you like a boulder.{/n} "Go. I do not want to see you right now. Perhaps later we shall speak again."
languages.original_text: "Вы не впервые мне об этом говорите. Я не желаю видеть вас прямо сейчас. Может, позже мы снова поговорим".

I do not want to see you right now. Perhaps later we shall speak again."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No es la primera vez que me lo dice. Ignoro si es una broma cruel o su corazón alberga dudas; sea como fuere, esta vez no intentaré rescatar lo que queda de nosotros». {n}Cassia te da la espalda, y te sientes abrumado por su congoja.{/n} «Márchese. Ahora mismo no tengo deseo alguno de verle. Tal vez luego podamos hablar».
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time you have said this to me. A cruel joke or your doubting heart — whatever it is, this time I will not try to save what is left of us." {n}Cassia turns away and despair crashes down upon you like a boulder.{/n} "Go. I do not want to see you right now. Perhaps later we shall speak again."

traits.locale_text: «No es la primera vez que me lo dice. Ignoro si es una broma cruel o su corazón alberga dudas; sea como fuere, esta vez no intentaré rescatar lo que queda de nosotros». {n}Cassia te da la espalda, y te sientes abrumado por su congoja.{/n} «Márchese. Ahora mismo no tengo deseo alguno de verle. Tal vez luego podamos hablar».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「このようなことをあなたから聞いたのは初めてではありません。たちの悪い冗談か、心が疑心暗鬼に陥っているのかわかりませんが…もう追わないことにします」{n}カシアは背を向けてしまい、絶望が岩石のように重くのしかかる。{/n}「出て行ってください。今はあなたの顔を見たくありません。後でまた話しましょう」
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time you have said this to me. A cruel joke or your doubting heart — whatever it is, this time I will not try to save what is left of us." {n}Cassia turns away and despair crashes down upon you like a boulder.{/n} "Go. I do not want to see you right now. Perhaps later we shall speak again."

traits.locale_text: 「このようなことをあなたから聞いたのは初めてではありません。たちの悪い冗談か、心が疑心暗鬼に陥っているのかわかりませんが…もう追わないことにします」{n}カシアは背を向けてしまい、絶望が岩石のように重くのしかかる。{/n}「出て行ってください。今はあなたの顔を見たくありません。後でまた話しましょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这种话你已经不是第一次对我说了。不管这是个残酷的玩笑，还是你的内心充满了疑虑，我这次都不会试图挽救我们之间残存的感情了。”{n}卡西娅转身离开，绝望像巨石一样向你砸来。{/n}“你走吧，我现在不想见到你。也许以后我们还可以再说说话。”
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time you have said this to me. A cruel joke or your doubting heart — whatever it is, this time I will not try to save what is left of us." {n}Cassia turns away and despair crashes down upon you like a boulder.{/n} "Go. I do not want to see you right now. Perhaps later we shall speak again."

traits.locale_text: “这种话你已经不是第一次对我说了。不管这是个残酷的玩笑，还是你的内心充满了疑虑，我这次都不会试图挽救我们之间残存的感情了。”{n}卡西娅转身离开，绝望像巨石一样向你砸来。{/n}“你走吧，我现在不想见到你。也许以后我们还可以再说说话。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas la première fois que vous me dites cela. Qu'il s'agisse d'une plaisanterie cruelle ou d'une remise en question sincère, je ne tenterai plus de sauver ce qu'il reste de notre relation. » {n}Cassia se détourne et un profond désespoir s'abat sur vous.{/n} « Partez. Je ne veux plus vous voir pour le moment. Nous en reparlerons peut-être plus tard. »
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time you have said this to me. A cruel joke or your doubting heart — whatever it is, this time I will not try to save what is left of us." {n}Cassia turns away and despair crashes down upon you like a boulder.{/n} "Go. I do not want to see you right now. Perhaps later we shall speak again."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas la première fois que vous me dites cela. Qu'il s'agisse d'une plaisanterie cruelle ou d'une remise en question sincère, je ne tenterai plus de sauver ce qu'il reste de notre relation. » {n}Cassia se détourne et un profond désespoir s'abat sur vous.{/n} « Partez. Je ne veux plus vous voir pour le moment. Nous en reparlerons peut-être plus tard. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr sagt das nicht zum ersten Mal zu mir. Ein grausamer Scherz oder Euer zweifelndes Herz. Was es auch ist, dieses Mal werde ich nicht versuchen, zu retten, was noch von uns übrig ist." {n}Cassia wendet sich ab, und Verzweiflung kracht auf dich hinab wie ein Fels.{/n} "Geht. Ich will Euch gerade nicht sehen. Vielleicht unterhalten wir uns später."
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time you have said this to me. A cruel joke or your doubting heart — whatever it is, this time I will not try to save what is left of us." {n}Cassia turns away and despair crashes down upon you like a boulder.{/n} "Go. I do not want to see you right now. Perhaps later we shall speak again."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sagt das nicht zum ersten Mal zu mir. Ein grausamer Scherz oder Euer zweifelndes Herz. Was es auch ist, dieses Mal werde ich nicht versuchen, zu retten, was noch von uns übrig ist." {n}Cassia wendet sich ab, und Verzweiflung kracht auf dich hinab wie ein Fels.{/n} "Geht. Ich will Euch gerade nicht sehen. Vielleicht unterhalten wir uns später."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "This is not the first time you have said this to me. A cruel joke or your doubting heart — whatever it is, this time I will not try to save what is left of us." {n}Cassia turns away and despair crashes down upon you like a boulder.{/n} "Go. I do not want to see you right now. Perhaps later we shall speak again."

languages.text: "Bunu daha önce de demiştin. Zalimce bir şaka mı yoksa tereddütteki kalbin mi bilmem lakin bu kez bizden arta kalanı kurtarmaya çabalamayacağım." {n}Cassia başını çeviriyor. Göğsüne taş oturmuşçasına kedere boğuluyorsun.{/n} "Git. Şu an seni görmek istemiyorum. Belki başka zaman tekrar konuşuruz."
languages.original_text: "This is not the first time you have said this to me. A cruel joke or your doubting heart — whatever it is, this time I will not try to save what is left of us." {n}Cassia turns away and despair crashes down upon you like a boulder.{/n} "Go. I do not want to see you right now. Perhaps later we shall speak again."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu daha önce de demiştin. Zalimce şaka mı yaptın yoksa kalbin kararsız mı kaldı, bilmiyorum ama bu kez ilişkimizi kurtarmaya çalışmayacağım." {n}Cassia başını çeviriyor. Göğsüne taş oturmuşçasına kedere boğuluyorsun.{/n} "Git. Şimdi seni görmek istemiyorum. Belki başka zaman tekrar konuşuruz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
